Metric Types are defined as the classification of measure. For example, Sale, e-comm sale, etc..

User can also configure the duration of the metrics. For example, weekly, monthly, etc.

 

Filters

The  metric types filters are:

  • Calculate Model Metric
  • Description
  • Fulfilment Type
  • Metric Type Id
  • Time Period Level
  • UOM

Creating a Metric Type

To create a new metric type:

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Metric Configuration > Metric Types
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Metric Type window.
  4. Enter a unique Metric Type Identifier. This is a required field.
  5. Enter a Unit Of Measure for metric type. When interfacing metric and plan data, the unit of measure has to be in Unit (Eaches). 
  6. Enter the Description for metric type.
  7.  Select the Time Period Level at which metric types are interfaced. This is a required field.
  8.  Select Fulfilment Type checkbox if this is a metric for a fulfillment program.
  9. Select Calculate Model Metric checkbox to indicate whether the model metric is computed or not for this metric type.
  10. Click Save.

Editing Metric Types

To edit metric types:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Metric Configuration > Metric Types
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required metric types record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Metric Types window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save to save the modified metric types details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required metric types record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Metric Types window, modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save to save the modified metric types details.

Details View

 

Swipe Out List

  • Select the required metric types record. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Details.
  • In the Metric Types wizard, you can view the details of metric types.

Details View

  • Select the required record card and you can view the actions buttons displayed on the footer section.
  • Click Details from the action button to view details of metric types.
Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Metric Type Id

The metric type identifier must be unique. 
UOM

The Unit of measure for metric type.

 

Note: UOM conversion is not available and UOM is not used for any computation involving metrics.

Description

The description of the metric type.
Time Period Level

The time period level at which metric types are interfaced.

Note: The time period level should be one of the business calendar levels defined in the business calendar.

Examples are week, month, quarter, and year.
Fulfilment Type Used to include if this is a metric for a fulfillment program.
Calculate Model Metric Used to indicate whether the model metric is computed or not for this metric type.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of grade attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the Metric Types window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Metric Types window to edit the records.
Details Opens the relevant Metric Types window to view and edit the records.
